text: Allakh, poistine, kupil u vernykh I dushi ikh, i ikh dobro, (Platya) vzamen im rayskim Sadom. Oni srazhayutsya na promysle Allakha; Razya vragov, i sami srazheny byvayut, Kak obetovano po Istine Yego Cherez Zakon, Yevangeliye i Koran. A kto v obetovanii verney Allakha! Likuyte zhe ot vygodnogo torga, Kotoryy s Nim vy zaklyuchili! Siye - velikaya udacha
